import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { paymentProductdetail } from '../actions/paymentAction' import { Card, ListGroup, Button, Col, Row, Image, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import ErrorMessageBox from '../components/ErrorMessagebox' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function PaymentProjectDescription(props) { const params = useParams() const { id: projectId } = params const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect( (projectId) => { dispatch(paymentProductdetail(projectId)) }, [dispatch] ) const payment = useSelector((state) => state.payment) const { Item } = payment const checkoutHandler = () => { props.history.push('/signin?redirect=shipping') } return (
